course_recommendations_markdown:
### Recommended Courses for Missing Skills:

#### Infrastructure as Code:
1. **Course:** "Introduction to Infrastructure as Code" on Coursera
2. **Course:** "Getting Started with Infrastructure as Code" on Udemy
3. **Course:** "Infrastructure as Code on Azure" on Microsoft Learn
4. **Course:** "Automating AWS Infrastructure with Terraform" on edX

#### Solution Design:
1. **Course:** "Azure Solutions Architect: Design and Implement Solutions" on LinkedIn Learning
2. **Course:** "Architecting Microsoft Azure Solutions" on Udemy
3. **Course:** "Cloud Solution Architect Certification Course" on Coursera
4. **Course:** "Designing Distributed Systems" on edX

#### Networking:
1. **Course:** "Azure Networking Concepts" on Microsoft Learn
2. **Course:** "Networking in the Cloud" on Coursera
3. **Course:** "Azure Virtual Network Fundamentals" on Udemy
4. **Course:** "Networking in AWS" on LinkedIn Learning

#### Cloud Security:
1. **Course:** "Azure Security Fundamentals" on Microsoft Learn
2. **Course:** "Cloud Security Basics" on Coursera
3. **Course:** "Securing Cloud Infrastructure" on Udemy
4. **Course:** "Cybersecurity in the Cloud" on edX

---

### Trusted Learning Websites for Self-Paced Tutorials:

1. **Website:** [Microsoft Learn](https://learn.microsoft.com/)
2. **Website:** [Azure Blog](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/azure-blog/bg-p/AzureBlog)
3. **Website:** [Cloud Academy](https://cloudacademy.com/)
4. **Website:** [Pluralsight](https://www.pluralsight.com/)

Good luck with your learning journey to become an Azure Solutions Architect! 🚀
